profile.name: Richard Schneeman
profile.headline: @schneems Senior Software Engineer | Cloud Native Buildpacks & Puma Expert
profile.summary: Highly skilled developer with a passion for open-source projects and cloud-native technologies. Proven track record of contributing to Heroku's Cloud Native Buildpacks and Puma, with expertise in Ruby and Rust.

experience.title: @schneems Senior Software Engineer
description: Fixed critical issues in Cloud Native Buildpacks
Implemented new features for Puma's development and testing processes

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the project's development and maintenance
Collaborated with other maintainers on bug fixes and feature implementations

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom solutions for clients using Ruby and Rust
Provided expertise on bundler and sqlite3 issues
